name: The Wakers
description:
Who Are the Wakers?

Great things are waking in this world, and it has stirred a mission in you. It's time to wake the giant spirits. As all initiates know, there's only 3 things you need to do to: ring the bell, read the scroll and light the candle.

Easy right?

Now just keep doing that forever as you journey through this mysterious reality! Are you waking the spirits or are they waking you?

The Wakers is a Relaxing, Mystical Puzzle Journey

Instantly accessible yet richly creative puzzle gameplay where each level is a compact, meditative space of coves, groves and clearings. Simply orbit your camera around the centre of each level and point-and-click anything from machinery to plants, creatures and magic spells to discover a huge array of puzzle gameplay, giving you amazing freedom to find your own solutions!


• wind gears to rearrange architecture
• magically transform special polymorphable objects at the click of a button
• read magical scrolls to cast spells
• guide laser beams to activate, melt or cut through objects
• shoot projectiles and rearrange walls to ricochet things to where you need them
• shoot flaming arrows to spread fires, spread currents through electrical devices
• lure in or scare away creatures to help you
• destroy crumbling architecture
• decode ciphers
• use the natural elements – click a cloud to make it rain, or find ways to conjure wind, water or fire
• and so much more to discover – leave no stone unturned!

Features

• beautiful, serene meditative environments and music
• creative problem solving – multiple ways to solve many of the game's levels
• alternate outcomes – all levels can be solved by ringing the bell, reading the scroll and lighting the candle, but if you're a clever player you can find other secret portals that reward you with access to secret levels in the overworld
• rescue all the secret miniature spirits hidden throughout the game
• short and sweet – the main path only takes a few hours to complete
